intro: Myosotis paucipilosa, commonly known as the slender forget-me-not, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It is a member of the Boraginaceae family and is characterized by its delicate blue or purple flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shady environments such as forest floors and stream banks. It has slender stems and small, lance-shaped leaves. Myosotis paucipilosa is often found in alpine and subalpine regions, where it thrives in cool, humid conditions.
